<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Intimidating Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=368) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 146 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence. Make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), or frightened 2 on a critical hit.
name: Intimidating Strike
